law.catch_line: Emission standards for carburetion systems -- Functions transferred to cabinet.
law.text: There are hereby transferred to and vested in the secretary and cabinet all functions, powers and duties, funds, personnel, equipment and supplies relating to emission standards for carburetion systems under provisions of KRS 234.321, which said provisions of law have been conferred upon the Department of Health and upon the commissioner and other officers and offices of the Department of Health.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 11, effective June 21, 1974.
